item.title: Makefile tutorial
item.description: Automation files for building/compiling/testing. Originaly made for compiling c/c++. Read more.. target: prerequisites recipe target - filename that is generated(might not run if file exists) or just a function name (PHONY targets) prequisites - something that is needed for the recipe to work recipe - actions .

item.title: My-First-Post
item.description: Hello there! I like static sites, they are the best! The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
